mapper.select: select sm.* from sys_menu sm left join sys_role_menu srm on sm.menu_id = srm.menu_id left join sys_role sr on srm.role_id = sr.role_id left join sys_user_role sur on sr.role_id = sur.role_id where sm.state = 1 and sr.state = 1 and sm.menu_type in ('D','M') and sur.user_id = #{userId} order by sm.parent_id, sm.order_num
